roleset.name: make into less of a crime (or not a crime)
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: args 1,2,3
example.text: The commission also recommended [minor traffic offenses]-1 be decriminalized [*-1] from misdemeanors to civil offenses.

example.name: Standard usage
example.text: I gott a suggestion : Try *PRO*-1 decriminalizing marijuana , and our prison populations will fall off immediately , and in a huge way .
